description: Try our easy to follow Pesto Pasta Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury muffin,High protein,Seafood free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Baking
name: Pesto Pasta Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch spring onion, reserve some to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 12hole muffin pan with paper cases. Cook pasta according to packet instructions. Drain.
Meanwhile, in a small frying pan, heat oil over medium heat. Add bacon and cook, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes or until crispy.
Combine pasta, bacon, pesto, 1 cup cheese, egg and spring onion in a large bowl. Season to taste.

Spoon mixture into prepared muffin pan, press down firmly with back of spoon and sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake for 12 minutes or until golden. Allow to cool slightly, then carefully remove muffins with a spoon and sprinkle over extra spring onion to garnish.
